title: Baked Bananas with Chocolate
directions: Divide half of the banana slices between two 1-cup ramekins and sprinkle half of chocolate over them. Arrange remaining banana slices over chocolate and top with remaining chocolate.
In a bowl stir together cream and vanilla and pour over mixtures. Bake desserts in middle of oven 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 small bananas, peeled and sliced thin crosswise
2 ounces fine-quality bittersweet chocolate (not unsweetened), chopped fine
